long_description: When did backpacks get so complicated? The Poler Rucksack Daypack has a classic old school design that looks as good now as it did 30 years ago. It comes with removable side pouches. Padded internal sleeve holds up to a 15 in. laptop. Pouches can hold a water bottle or toiletries, or can be taken off the outside and used inside as organizers. Without pouches, the rucksack is slimmer for use at the office or school. Made of rugged 1000-denier Campdura nylon and lined with 420-denier nylon. Nylon webbing is the same super high-tensile-strength webbing used for seatbelts. Buckles are embossed wtih the Poler cyclops logo; "Camp Vibes" is embossed on the leather tabs. The Poler Rucksack daypack is intended to carry no more than 20 lbs.
short_description: When did backpacks get so complicated? The Poler Rucksack Daypack has a classic old school design that looks as good now as it did 30 years ago. It comes with removable side pouches.
